## ContainerProps.restartPolicy property

The behavior to apply when the container exits.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
restartPolicy?: RestartPolicy;
```

## Remarks

See [RestartPolicy](./cloud.restartpolicy.md) and [RestartPolicyName](./cloud.restartpolicyname.md) for the possible values and corresponding behavior.
